article_title: Should you ever spank your kids? Pediatricians say no, but parents still do
article_text: Suzanne Cassidy is a Lancaster Newspapers reporter. She can be reached atscassidy@lnpnews.com. You can also follow @SuzCassidyLNP on Twitter.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , spanking, discipline, lancaster county children's alliance, dr. maria mccolgan, dr. cathy hoshauer, donald b. kraybill, amish, parenting, crystal natan, lancaster county children & youth
article_metadata.author: SUZANNE CASSIDY | Staff Writer

og.description: Most American parents spank their children. But pediatricians and other child advocates say spanking is harmful, and urge against it.
